2068870.name: CBU Ivys Reine Pack
2068870.description:
CosmicBreak Universal is now offering a delightful item pack especially for Ivis Reine's fans!

A must-have for all Ivis Reine enthusiasts, this DLC included limited characters like Ivis-chan and Ivis, parts, titles, and other exclusive items! Don't pass this chance up!
The item pack also includes a Garapon ticket and other useful goodies!


Pack Contents (Robots)
  • Ivis Reine
  • Ivis-chan

Pack Contents (Parts)
  • Ivis Rucksack Booster x1
  • Ivis Print Fan x1
  • Title [Sylvia Fan ♪] x1

Pack Conents (Other)
  • 100 Rt
  • SP Garapon Ticket（x5）
    [*Cosmo Harmonics 20%（x30）
  • Tune-Up Set 10（x5）
  • ALL×3 Ticket 1h（x3）

※Purchase of this Pack is limited to one per account.
※[SP Garapon Tickets] allow players to roll the Garapon in the Shop.
※The Zero Saber visible in the screenshot is not included in this Pack.
2068870.supported_languages:
英语, 日语*, 繁体中文
*具有完全音频支持的语言
